name: ExiSum
description:
Exisum is a puzzle game based around solving maths problems for unknown values. Explore beautiful dioramas while solving difficult, rewarding puzzles. Get your pen and paper ready and switch on your brains! 

Currently, there are 4 levels but the plan is to add more in further development. The levels have randomly generated numbers so replayability is guaranteed.

Asset Credits

  • Menu selection click sound by NenadSimic
  • Main menu music by pheonton
